name: My Zen Meltdown
description:
Using the mouse pointer, hover over the floating notes to temporarily transform them into blocks of sound. If your tower surpasses the red line in the upper right corner, you will find your reward.

If you play it twice on Itch (screen refresh), it seems you have to click the mouse once to get the sound to start working again.

I was inspired by a movie about the Beach Boys and by My Singing Monsters. And, of course, by messing around with my violin and bandlab. 

The code, images and sound were produced by me on Scratch for the "Itching to Scratch" Jam of Creator's Campfire.

It is also on Scratch if you want to see the code or experience a different type of glitching.
